entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to ice pellets or freezing rain before morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
